result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

10:39 AM Defendant Shawna L. Saglin in court, in custody from the Vilas County Jail.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant continues to wait appointment from the PD Office. Tracking along with 22CM97 until an attorney is appointed. Bond continued.
Status hearing scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
SPD Status of Counsel Reports - 1,880 contacts

9:25 AM Defendant Shawna L. Saglin appeared by video without counsel.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Court notes status of counsel reports from PD Office. Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 12, 2022 at 09:15 am.

Defendant appears by video without Counsel.  DA Hayes appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Public defender still seeking counsel for defendant.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report

Defendant appears in court, in custody, without counsel.  DA Hayes appears in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Public defender has made 106 contacts seeking representation for defendant.  Court continues bond.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Conditions of bond  No possession illegal prescriptions or drugs.

1:43 PM Defendant appears by video from the Vilas County Jail without counsel.  DA Karl Hayes appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of criminal complaint.  Bond set at $500.00 cash.  No contact with Montrell Hall.  No possession of illegal drugs or prescriptions.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 10:30 am.
